name: Hide Facebook Polls 1.2
description:
Hides polls from Facebook.
Nothing more, nothing less and therefore should be 100% compatible with other custom FB styles.
additional_info:
Version 1.1:
Os of October 2011 FB removed the poll ID from "data-ft". As far as I can see, polls in general can't be completely hidden now.
Nonetheless they at least can be partially hidden.
This update to 1.1 does that.

Hints how to hide them completely again (if possible) are welcome.

Version 1.2:
FB messed with polls again. New update to get them hidden again.
